## <font face="" color=BLUE> Step 1</font>  
## ***<font face="" color=blue>Here I make a data frame from the air quality dataset and summary it.</font>***
```{r airquality1}
mydata<-data.frame(airquality)
summary(mydata)
```

## <font face="" color=blue>Step 2</font>
## ***<font face="" color=blue>There are some NA values in this dataset, as shown below.</font>***
```{r airquality2}
mydata
```


## <font face="" color=blue> Step 3 </font>
## ***<font face="" color=blue>In the next chunk, I clean the dataset from NA values and display it.</font>***
```{r airquality3}
good<-complete.cases(mydata)
mydata[good, ]
```
